greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: From square root of Riemann zeta function: form Dirichlet series Sum b_n/n^s whose square is zeta function; sequence gives numerator of b_n.
comment: b(n) = A046643(n)/A046644(n) is multiplicative with b(p^n) = (2n-1)!!/2^n/n!. Dirichlet g.f. of A046643(n)/A046644(n) is sqrt(zeta(x)). - _Christian G. Bower_, May 16 2005
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
maple: b := proc(n) option remember; local c,i,t1; if n = 1 then 1 else c := 1; t1 := divisors(n);
for i from 2 to nops(t1)-1 do c := c-b(t1[ i ])*b(n/t1[ i ]); od; c/2; fi; end;
mathematica: Do[c = c - b[dn[[i]]]*b[n/dn[[i]]], {i, 2, Length[dn] - 1}]; c/2); a[n_] := Numerator[b[n]]; a /@ Range[90] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 04 2011, after Maple version *)
program: A046643(n) = numerator(A046643perA046644(n)); \\ After Maple-program, _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 08 2017
;; Or, after _Christian G. Bower_'s May 16 2005 comment:
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 1999
